info.name: Arabic Font Fix
info.description:
Fixing the small Arabic font on Firefox browser.
To make sure it will work, you have to make sure that those fonts 'lucida grande, tahoma, verdana and arial' are installed on your computer.
info.additionalInfo:
- v2.0
Major code clean up & fixes.
Added support for new websites.

- v1.6
Added support to Google & Reddit.

- v1.5
Added support to VK.

- v1.1
Changed the script title & description.
Added support to YouTube and Wikipedia.
